mainSequence.step: Batch Submitter navigates to EDRMS Documentation Section
Batch Submitter provides Credentials to Authentication Service
User is authenticated by Authentication Service
EDRMS Website requests Ingest Process Docs from Documentation Server
Documentation Server retrieves Documentation from Ingest Process Documentation
Documentation Server returns the Documentation to EDRMS Website
EDRMS Website sends the Documentation Link to Batch Submitter
Batch Submitter displays the Documentation Link received from EDRMS Website
Batch Submitter clicks on the Documentation Link
EDRMS Website redirects Batch Submitter to Ingest Process Documentation
Ingest Process Documentation is displayed to Batch Submitter
